text: Manuel de Ascázubi y Matheu (1802 - December 25, 1876) served as Vice President of Ecuador from 1847 to 1851 and in that capacity he was also acting President from 10 October 1849 to 10 June 1850. Ascásubi was born in 1802 in Guayaquil, Ecuador. He died on December 25, 1876 in Quito, Ecuador from a heart attack. He was 74 years old. ==Other websites== * Official Website of the Ecuadorian Government about the country President's History * * http://www.vicepresidencia.gov.ec/lavicepresidencia/historia/vicepresidentes- en-la-historia Category:1802 births Category:1876 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Presidents of Ecuador Category:Politicians from Guayaquil Category:Vice presidents of Ecuador
title: Manuel de Ascásubi
